QAPair.Question: What is (are) Knee joint replacement - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: You had surgery to replace some or all of the bones that make up your knee joint. This article tells you how to care for your new knee when you go home from the hospital.

QAPair.Question: What is the outlook for Knee joint replacement - discharge ?

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Knee joint replacement - discharge ?
